answers.answer: This is known amongst diabetes and referred to as the runner's high or exerciser's high.  It is caused by the liver releasing sugar to fuel your body during exercise.How high is high?Are you usually diabetic and your numbers in target?  What meds are you on?I'd discuss with your doctor and see if any adjustment in meds are needed.

question: I experience high blood sugar after doing exercise and sex, why is this happening?
title: High blood sugar after exercise and sex
